translation.offline_saved: You're offline. Entry saved locally and will sync when online.

translation.unlock_unlimited: Unlock unlimited medications and unlimited ADR reports
translation.track_health_needs: to track all your health needs without restrictions
translation.plus_cloud_sync: Plus get access to future cloud sync features.
translation.enjoy_unlimited: Enjoy unlimited medications and ADR reports.

translation.all_meds_today: You've taken all your meds for today. Keep it up!
translation.onboarding_welcome_description: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with managing your medications effectively.
translation.onboarding_language_description: Select your preferred language from the dropdown. You can change this anytime.
translation.onboarding_medication_description: Enter your medication name, dosage, and reminder time. Free users can add up to 3 medications.
translation.onboarding_notifications_description: Allow notifications so you never miss a dose. We'll remind you when it's time to take your medication.
translation.onboarding_premium_description: Free users get 3 medications and 3 ADR reports. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access!
translation.location_permission_denied: Location permission denied. Please enable location access.
translation.geolocation_not_supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
translation.onboarding_element_interactive: This element is interactive during the tutorial
translation.onboarding_element_not_found: Tutorial element not visible. You can still continue the tour.
translation.tutorial_help: Need help? Replay the tutorial anytime.
translation.onboarding_keyboard_hint: Use arrow keys to navigate, Escape to skip
translation.onboarding_swipe_hint: Swipe left or right to navigate steps
translation.pharmacy_api_error: Unable to fetch pharmacy data. Please try again.

translation.pharmacy_using_cached_fallback: Using cached results due to connection error

translation.pharmacy_finder_description: Find nearby pharmacies using your location.

translation.privacy_settings_description: Manage your privacy preferences and control how your data is used.

translation.privacy_share_analytics_description: Help improve MedAdhere by sharing anonymous usage data with developers.
translation.privacy_share_providers_description: Allow NGOs, clinics, and hospitals to access your aggregated adherence data.
translation.privacy_data_export_description: Download all your data in JSON format (GDPR compliant).
translation.privacy_export_error: Failed to export data. Please try again.
translation.privacy_policy_description: Your privacy is important to us. Here's how we handle your data:
translation.privacy_policy_point_1: All medication data is stored in English for consistency
translation.privacy_policy_point_2: Your data is encrypted and securely stored in the cloud
translation.privacy_policy_point_3: You can export or delete your data at any time
translation.privacy_policy_point_4: We never sell your personal information to third parties
translation.privacy_delete_warning: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data. This action cannot be undone.
translation.privacy_delete_confirm_prompt: Type DELETE to confirm account deletion:

translation.settings_logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
